import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import './Filecss/Hero.css' const Hero = () => { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(1); const changeSlide = (slideNumber) => { setCurrentSlide(slideNumber); }; useEffect(() => { const slideTimer = setTimeout(() => { const nextSlide = currentSlide === 4 ? 1 : currentSlide + 1; setCurrentSlide(nextSlide); }, 5000); return () => clearTimeout(slideTimer); }, [currentSlide]); return (
{/* items */} {currentSlide === 1 && ( /* */
What are you waiting for, create an event
)} {currentSlide === 2 && ( /* */

If you don't bring anything new to the world, you are a blame for it.

)} {currentSlide === 3 && ( /* */

Discover Our New Collection

Make the change with us to live an active life

)} {currentSlide === 4 && ( /* */

Be with us to create joy and joy

)} {/* buttons */} {/* Previous button */} {/* Next button */}
); }; export default Hero;
